summary: Completed testing of extended admin dashboard features for Kantik Tracks Studio. Backend admin APIs are 100% functional with comprehensive endpoints for stats, songs, payments, and user management. However, frontend has critical rendering issues preventing proper testing of UI components.

ui_bugs.issue: Complete frontend rendering failure - pages display as black/blank screen
ui_bugs.details: Cannot access login page, admin dashboard, or any frontend components due to rendering failure

ui_bugs.issue: Stats cards not loading data properly - only 3 cards visible instead of expected 5-6
ui_bugs.details: Stats API works but frontend not displaying Total Users, Active Standard, Active Team, Pending Payments, Total Songs

ui_bugs.issue: Songs not loading in admin interface despite 10 songs existing in backend
Users not loading in admin interface despite 4 users existing in backend
HTML structure warnings causing hydration errors with span elements in tbody

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not properly integrating with admin APIs despite APIs working correctly

passed_tests: All 29 backend API tests passed (100% success rate)
Admin stats API returns proper data (totalUsers, activeStandard, activeTeam, pendingPayments, totalSongs)
Admin songs API returns all 10 songs with resources
Admin payments API with filtering (pending/approved/rejected/all) working
Admin users API returns all users with details
Admin user actions (promote/demote admin, reset plan) working
Admin payment review and approval system functional
Authentication and authorization controls working in backend
Admin access control properly implemented in backend APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Frontend application has complete rendering failure causing black/blank screens. Cannot test admin dashboard UI features due to this blocker. Need to investigate and fix fundamental frontend rendering issues before admin dashboard functionality can be properly validated. Backend admin APIs are fully functional and ready.
